createAccountOnboarding.title: Your secure, private digital life.
createAccountOnboarding.content: Use apps, communicate with others, and store data in complete privacy with a SAFE Account.

createAccountOnboarding.title: Pay as you go with Safecoin. Not with you privacy.
createAccountOnboarding.content: You don't pay for services by sacrificing privacy. You pay only for what you use, in a currency called Safecoin.

createAccountOnboarding.title: Earn Safecoin with a Vault.
createAccountOnboarding.content: You can pay for your account by running a Vault on your home computer. Contribute computer power to the network and be rewarded for it.

createAccountOptionList.title: Get an Invite
createAccountOptionList.content: Receive an invite, and you'll have all you need to get going.

createAccountOptionList.title: Request an Invite
createAccountOptionList.content: Ask the community for an invite to get started fast

createAccountOptionList.title: Earn one Yourself
createAccountOptionList.content: Use your computer to earn Safecoins and create an account
